Command Line Utilites¶

Convert BAM to BED¶

Transform BAM reads to resemble the true position of a ChIP seq fragment.

usage: bam2bed [-h] [-b BFILE] [-l LTYPE] [-e EXTEN] [-o OFILE]
Options:
-b BAM file. Aligned single or paried-end ChIP-seq reads
-l=200 INT. Library type: 0 if library is paired-end, fragment length is estimated from data; different from 0 if library is single-end, the value assigned here is used as fragment length.
-e=74 INT. Half length of each read around their fragment midpoing.
-o Output file.

Counts the number of overlapping between two BED files¶

Counts the number of overlapping between two BED files.

usage: checkMatches [-h] [-f1 FILE1] [-f2 FILE2] [-o OFILE]
Options:
-f1 BED enrichment file replicate 1.
-f2 BED enrichment file replicate 2.
-o BED enrichment file with the intersection of replicates 1 and 2.

Generate coverage over nucleosomes¶

Generate coverage over nucleosomes.

usage: getAvrCov [-h] [-b BFILE] [-n NFILE] [-f FSIZE] [-w WWIDTH] [-o OFILE]
Options:
-b BAM file.
-n BED file with enriched nucleosomes.
-f INT. Fragment size of the reads.
-w INT. Half width of plotting window.
-o Prefix of output files.

Count reads per nucleosome¶

Count reads per nucleosome.

usage: getCounts [-h] [-b BFILE] [-n NFILE] [-l LTYPE] [-e EXTEN] [-o OFILE]
Options:
-b BAM file. ChIP-seq reads.
-n BED file. Nucleosome data, output of Danpos. Only nucleosomes with p-values < 1e-5 are used
-l INT. Library type: if equal to 0, data is assumed to be paired-end and read lengths are estimated from data itself; if different from 0, data is assumed to be single-end and read lengths use this value extend every read.
-e INT. Half length of reads extended at their midpoint.
-o STR. Name of output file.

Produces coverage figures¶

Generate coverage figures.

usage: getFigures [-h] [-b BFILE] [-n NFILE] [-f FRAGL] [-hr HALFR]
                  [-hw HALFW] [-o OFILE]
Options:
-b BAM file.
-n BED file with nucleosome positions.
-f Fragment length if single-end library. If library is paired-end, provide 0 as fragment length.
-hr Half length of reads extended at their midpoint.
-hw Half length of the windows.
-o Output file.

Generate coverage over nucleosomes¶

Generate coverage over nucleosomes.

usage: getProfile [-h] [-b BFILE] [-n NFILE] [-f FSIZE] [-w WWIDTH] [-o OFILE]
Options:
-b BAM file.
-n BED file with enriched nucleosomes.
-f INT. Fragment size of the reads.
-w INT. Half width of plotting window.
-o Prefix of output files.

Meges the rows of two BED files¶

Merge the rows of two BED files.

usage: merged [-h] [-f1 F1FILE] [-f2 F2FILE] [-o OFILE]
Options:
-f1 BED file. File 1.
-f2 BED file. File 2.
-o STR. Name of output file.
